properties.areaDesc: Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N; Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Mona Passage Southward to 17N; Coastal Waters OF Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 10:30AM AST until January 20 at 2:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...NORTHERLY SWELL AND WIND-DRIVEN SEAS WILL GENERATE HAZARDOUS
SEAS ACROSS THE REGION BY SATURDAY...

.The combination of a northerly swell and wind-driven seas will
generate hazardous seas across the local waters by Saturday and
continuing through early next week. Fresh to strong winds and
frequent gusty winds are also expected during this period.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 7
to 14 feet expected.

* WHERE...Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico and USVI from 10 NM to
19.5N, Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM,
Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N, Mona
Passage Southward to 17N and Coastal Waters OF Northwestern
Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to 2 PM AST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Conditions
will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 2 PM AST MONDAY
